next.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
next.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持无线充电的同时，还能为手机降温。它能在电池寿命和手机性能之间进行调整，使手机长时间运行在最佳状态。
localize.tagline: 保持手机凉爽，同时进行无线充电

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持無線充電的同時，還能爲手機降溫。它能在電池壽命和手機性能之間進行調整，使手機長時間運行在最佳狀態。
localize.tagline: 保持手機涼爽，同時進行無線充電
